attributes.action: Stop China abusing dogs and eating them.
attributes.additional_details: Eating and abusing dogs in China is going to far and should be stopped.
attributes.background: To have a World vote to stop China eating and abusing dogs.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for the action you have requested.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Urge the Chinese government to stop the annual Yulin Dog Eating Festival: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308926

Pressure Chinese & Korean governments to end slaughter of cats & dogs for meat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318423

Stop trade with China until wet markets and animal cruelty is outlawed: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312691
